column4: I already had him install that last night so he has that already.
not if he can't play quicktime
it's "ps aux | grep wine"
please stop repeating commands i have given and typo'ing them
i suggest you look again
with VLC?
This is a link, and usually I open it right in FireFox.
sudo apt-get install mozilla-plugin-vlc
restart Fx for the plugin to be recognized.
Okay thanks. :)
what station?
It's a station in St. Louis which I like to listen to at midnight Central Standard Time. Because it has Coast to Coast AM with George Noory :)

buy from System76 and expedite shipping.
